How to inject SameSiteCookieProcessor in CCv2
=============================================

For each <aspect> which requires SameSite cookie settings open service properties and add the following:

ccv2.file.override.<unique number 1>.path=/opt/hybris/sameSiteCookies.properties
ccv2.file.override.<unique number 1>.content=<base64 encoded content of 'sameSiteCookies.properties'>

ccv2.file.override.<unique number 2>.path=/opt/startup/context.xml
ccv2.file.override.<unique number 2>.content=<base64 encoded content of 'context.xml'>

ccv2.file.override.<unique number 3>.path=/opt/tomcat/lib/samesite.jar
ccv2.file.override.<unique number 3>.content=<base64 encoded content of 'samesite.jar'>


Here's a concrete example:

ccv2.file.override.80.path=/opt/hybris/sameSiteCookies.properties
ccv2.file.override.80.

ccv2.file.override.81.path=/opt/startup/context.xml
ccv2.file.override.81.

ccv2.file.override.82.path=/opt/tomcat/lib/samesite.jar
ccv2.file.override.82.
